reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be a fancy party dress that feels like a fairy princess and is perfect for wedding guests. Moreover, the dress is comfortable, with one customer noting its stretchy smocked bodice that accommodates real curves, and they appreciate its flattering shape and true-to-size fit. Additionally, the dress receives positive feedback for its quality, color, and suitability for various formal events. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: I LOVE THIS DRESS! It is the same color as shown, and it fits my 5'10" 245lb self great! I got the XXL. It's very flattering and very comfortable! I'm very sensitive to "itchy" materials, but I don't feel that at all in this dress. I wore it to a friend's rehearsal dinner and will be wearing it to another wedding. It doesn't wrinkle super easy which I love. The entire dress has fabric underneath it, so it's only sheer past my knees. It's stretchy and comfortable around the bust area, which is so nice! I wear a 40G and I feel covered and not exposed at all. I want to get this dress in another color! It feels a little expensive (I'm very cheap), but it's so worth the money. It's a great dress! Read more
items.author: Eliza

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Fit well, very comfortable and cute! I bought it for a wedding and it was perfect for chasing my toddler in! I’m 5’9 and it hit me mid-lower calf. Fits true to size but wasn’t snug by any means. Read more
items.author: Savannah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Elegance
items.body: Beautiful and fun formal dress option! This flowy, stretchy, and comfortable choice made a perfect dress for a summer wedding. The material is breathable, and the fit is true to size. Such an affordable beauty! Read more
items.author: Cari V.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering, thick quality material
items.body: Im a size 16/18, about 220lbs. I ordered an XL and it fits perfectly. Length falls to just above the ankle, and I'm 5'3. Material is heavy and high quality. I feel like it was very flattering for my body shape, and I felt confident the whole time I was wearing it. The navy color option was true navy and exactly as pictured. Sleeves do not pinch and are comfortable. It has a modest bust area, which I appreciated. I definitely recommend this dress, and there was actually another guest at the wedding wearing the light pink version of this same dress. It looked great on her too! Unfortunately the only full body picture I got, I had people standing in front of me, so you cant see the dress well. But it really is very beautiful and suitable for all body sizes and shapes! Read more
items.author: Olivia Gregg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2. Mom-of-the-Groom Glow-Up in Ruffles
items.body: Picture the pre-wedding frenzy: my 5-year-old son zooming around with a lightsaber like a tiny Jedi, knocking over chairs, while the whole clan’s buzzing, preparing for his older brother's wedding—I’m helping him while thinking about my wife’s nerves over looking just right as mother of the groom. She slips into this PRETTYGARDEN smocked midi tulle dress, square neck popping with those puffy sleeves, and whoa—suddenly she’s twirling like a vision, all worries gone. Boy, in our chaotic household, it screamed “easy elegance” without the fuss. Pros: * Flowy tulle tiers swish beautifully, lightweight polyester shell keeps it airy for summer events—my wife danced through the reception without overheating, unlike stiffer formal gowns we’ve eyed before. * Smocked bodice stretches comfy for real curves; she felt secure and flattering with her bust and tummy, true to size (we grabbed medium for her US 8-10 frame). * Lined for modesty, machine-washable ease—handled family photos and hugs without snags or itch, way softer than scratchy laces from other brands. * Versatile vibe: heels for the ceremony, flats for cake-cutting; that romantic silhouette turned heads at the wedding. Cons: * Sleeves can slip on shoulders during excited hugs—nitpicky, but she tugged ’em up mid-toast. * Runs a tad big in the bust for petite frames; my wife safety-pinned once for extra hold. * Wrinkles from packing—steamer fixed it quick, but arrived a bit rumpled. * Tulle layers add subtle volume; fine for most, but watch if you hate anything poofy. Pro tip: Steam before wearing to fluff the ruffles, and size down if between for a snugger smock—pairs great with simple jewelry to let the dress shine. After the big day, this dress was her confidence booster—transformed mom-anxiety into fabulous memories, one ruffled step at a time. Read more
items.author: Family Man

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but easy to tear skirt
items.body: I like and feel comfortable in this dress. It makes me feel pretty and hides my rolls. One downside is after just 2 events the mesh gathering on skirt came undone and I had to re gather it with thread. Read more
items.author: Cali Anderson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas Dress
items.body: It looks just like picture. I got a size medium and it fit nicely. The color is vibrant and rich. The material is stretchy and the netting on ruffle is nice. Thinking about buying a sheer long sleeved layering top to wear under it if it’s cold at Christmas. Anyway I love it. My 2 daughters and granddaughter got one also for Christmas pictures. Can’t wait to get these made. My sons are wearing the matching green shirts I also bought on Amazon. The length goes past my knees and I’m 5”10”” and weigh 155lbs. It doesn’t look poofy around the hips. Doesn’t show any bulges so it’s good . Read more
items.author: Taken2

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars He must have dress in one's wardrobe. Perfect in every way.
items.body: This is one of the most beautiful dresses I have purchased on Amazon. Perfect in every way. The fit, the flow, the color, and everything in between. It's a must-have in one's wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Janet A Sides

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Light Green, Sage Green, Black, Brick Red, Dark Green, Light Blue, Rose Red, Navy, Wine Red, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
